info.name: server
info.description: Email server name or IP address.

info.name: port
info.description: TCP port the email server is listening on.

info.name: tls
info.description: A string, either 'true' or 'false' that defines whether the email server requires encryption.

info.name: username
info.description: Authentication string of a user allowed to send emails through the email server.

info.name: password
info.description: Password associated with the specified user.
